summary: Tracing the life of Narayanan, renowned for developing the Vikas Engine -- one of the most efficient, liquid fuel engines in the world today that continues to be a workhorse at the Indian Space Research Organization (ISRO) in almost every launch, with the unique distinction of never having failed -- the former ISRO scientist and aerospace engineer was inevitably embroiled in a spy scandal. The biographical drama will unveil the truth behind the mystery as it unravels in an interview by celebrated superstar of Bollywood, Shah Rukh Khan (in English and Hindi) and Suriya Sivakumar (in Tamil) on a TV program.

reviews.content: One of the great movie and a eye opener for our people who are unaware that what anti National parties (especially one family) did with our great scientist not only with Nambi even so many like Bhama and also with our great PM of that time Shastri ji to stop our country growth.. must watch movie
The movie was great to watch. Based on a real story

Masterpiece For Indian Cinema Because JUST See This Movie And Feel for NAMBI SIR how He survived many years without Any Guilty KANOON KE LAMBE HATH ES MOVIE ME DIKHAYI NAHI DIYE I CRIED in THESTRE FOR THIS NAMBI SIR AND proud For THE R.MADHVAN (MEDDY) HE IS THE LEGEND . I public Goes To the theatre for GANGSTER (kgf) and Not Go for REAL HERO OF THE INDIA
A heartfelt story of a patriotic man who was shunned by his nation. Madhavan's noble intention really unmasks the story of nambi narayanan in a excellent manner.
A great movie, it's a must watch.

R. Madhavan's Rocketry: The Nambi Effect proves that it is that kind of a film that shines as an example of how biopics should be made. The stellar performances by the cast, strong dialogues, beautiful score and exceptional cinematography don't only make Rocketry: The Nambi Effect an intense and emotional ride, but also a memorable film that is worth every second of your time and every penny in your pocket!

Amazing movie, took me a while to watch, considering a biopic, but trust me it's way better than all the recent movies. Filled me up with tears and joy.
An amazing movie about an incredible man's journey just perfectly crafted.
Must watch for all genre lovers. You can't afford to miss this one out.
one of the best biography movies seen in the recent times

Really liked the movie, felt very sad how country ppl have treated a man who had great visions  to grow our country. When it come to crime or dealing with criminal they stand still and watch and when it comes to blame innocent they show full courage. Wish his family have not seen such horrific episode in their lives 🙏🏻🥺

Great movie - it shows how an Indian scientist uses his wits to outsmart developed nations who don't  want to share their rocket technology with India in order to maintain their dominance over developing nation .

This is what love to feel India and its' Indian. Director is what we should study as a case and refer.
A brilliant tale of a brilliant scientist. And yes; we, as a nation do apologize for what was done to you 'Nambi sir'.

Maddy has acted his career best in this movie!!.The story, screenplay depicted the life of Nambi sir as realistic as possible..the crew has done awesome work on Vfx ..All in all it is a kind of tribute/homage to nambi sir..All have to understand the struggles of scientists who are serving our nation🇮🇳🇮🇳
What a inspired movie hat's off

We watch only those movies that we are interested in like action, romantic, thriller/drama, horror. But Rocketry is a movie which must be watched by every indian because I consider this as a duty. Great movie, Awsome acting and directory by maddy 👌.

The movie was phenomenal. The life story of Nambi Narayan is so inspiring. The movie has been exceptionally directed. It gives you goosebumps. Sad to see such incredibly minds being exploited. Every part of the movie is fantastic. They have comedy, science, action, and suspense, especially the James Bond-like adventures in Russia. And then comes the torture, the imprisonment, which is brilliantly shown. It was a fantastic movie. One of the best movies I have ever seen!
Exceptional movie, superb story, acting and direction.

1. Movie took 6 years to make by a man utterly passionate about it. He lost weight, put on weight, grew hair, dyed hair white, even surgically displaced his own tooth to match real life character. WATCH IT.
2. He kept things accurate to reality. But you will feel it's surreal 'coz how can one man do all this. The man Nambi Narayan is AMAZING. WATCH IT.
3. There is big disparity between viewer rating and "critic" (jobless losers) rating. This is because the character in the movie is religious and according to "critics", it's the wrong religion (Hinduism). WATCH IT. 
4. Not the usual Bollywood BS with dance and action scenes. This is made in Hollywood style storytelling. WATCH IT 
5. Tells the real life story of a one-in-100-million genius who refused a job offer at NASA given by the President of USA himself. "Critics" who abuse/ashame their motherland hate this level of patriotism. WATCH IT.
6. Depicts also the story of a nation who's govt itself act to destroy the nation's scientific progress. A story of India prior to 2014. WATCH IT.
Great Movie. A must watch..
Excellent, could have been better though if dubbed in English.
Finely crafted cinematic magic ...... Best Acting, Best Direction, Award winning performance by R Madhavan

The movie is a gem and the hard work put by Maddy Sir (Madhavan) is reflected completely. The best part is that instead of complete focus and larger than life showcasing of the main scientist; his entire crew is given appropriate focus. Guest role by Suriya is also good. Shahrukh Khan brings his own charm during the climax.
Outstanding performance, we made and researched movie. Sincere effort to acknowledge contribution of the scientist. Madhavan has delivered his career best
One of great movie that watched recent times. Watch the movie , do not miss it .
Absolutely loved the movie. Very engaging .. Movie was quite interesting with zero boring moments.

The incredible life of ISRO rocket scientist Shri Nambi Narayanan could only be explored through screen this beautifully because of R. Madhavan's passion, research and dedication. Rocketry: The Nambi Effect proves that it is the kind of film that can be considered as one of the blueprints of how a biopic should be made. The stellar performances by the cast, strong dialogues, beautiful score and the exceptional cinematography doesn't only make R. Madhavan's Rocketry: The Nambi Effect an intense and emotional ride, but also a memorable movie that is worth every second of your time and every penny in your pocket!
An Inspirational movie for me

Another xlnt India movie.  Well acted.  Interesting.  Based on 'true' story how a brilliant Indian scientist kinda 'spied' in America and the UK to 'steal' secrets, then got in big hot water in India for Treason cuz he had to send some equipment thru Pakistan, but eventually exonnerated and became a national hero cuz India was the first country to send a rocket to Mars on first attempt.   in Hindi language, so lots of reading subtitles, with occasional English words & phrases. 
Saw it in 'lerton AMC A-ist tix, 7.5.2022
One of the best movies in recent times.
simply says, Fantastic movie, a must watch movie

This is a great historical movie about India's rocket program and how one man was targeted by special interests to derail tit. Dr Nambi was eventually cleared by courts and went on to win the prestigious Padma Bhushan award. The movie revolves around his arrest and subsequent aftermath. Warning: It is a dark and slow burn movie but they payoff is great in the final act.
We need movies like this & to teach Indians the importance of fighting for Bharat & her improvement
Wonderful movie. Every Indian should watch.
It is true story after all, excellent example of how a family led country distroy its own destiny
Must watch for an Indian. Great Script , Acting by main lead , emotional, music is good as well.

Words can't express the importance and significance of this movie. Wonderful performance by every artist based on absolutely true story and the honesty and true intention behind making this movie can be seen.. it's a must watch without any doubts. More than a movie it's a part of our dark history and it's high time we accept it and try our best to learn from our history and to make sure that same mistakes do not happen ever again.
